title: The Box
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 55 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 220L
description: If you could go anywhere in the world, where would you go? The character in The Box goes to lots of exciting places without ever leaving the backyard...that's the power of imagination! Detailed illustrations and a repetitive text structure support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to visualize as well as to identify setting to better understand the story.
reviewWords: anywhere, backyard, climb, mountains, ocean, special
phonics: Rhyme                : Identify and produce rhyming words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words go, my
